function.name: washingRinseCycle_setValue
function.description: This function is used to set the number of rinse cycles on a washing machine.

location.description: The location where the device is located.

room.description: The room where the device is located.

device.description: The name or type of the device to set the rinse cycle.

predefinedCompartment.description: The predefined compartment to set the rinse cycle.

rinseCycle.description: The specific number of rinse cycles to set on the washing machine.
